transportAdvice: Rotorua has a limited local bus network that connects some tourist areas, but many attractions are spread out and not easily walkable, making a rental car the most practical option for exploring the region. Taxis and shuttle services are available for transfers, but public transit coverage is not comprehensive enough to rely on for most sightseeing.
